## SyncArraysResponse type

Response data for state arrays

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type SyncArraysResponse<TState> = {
    [key in keyof TState]: SyncArrayResponse;
};
```
<b>References:</b> [SyncArrayResponse](./state-sync.syncarrayresponse.md)

## Remarks

Keys should correspond to prop configs with type 'array' in [SyncStatePropConfig](./state-sync.syncstatepropconfig.md)
